EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Spring Security 10AM.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Spring Security
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for the webinar Spring Security and Rob Winch. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Thursday, January 16, 2014
North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=664190952> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 664 190 952
Thank you,
